homepage.title: Send files directly, without the cloud
homepage.subtitle: A free, secure, and private way to share files with anyone, on any device.

features.title: Why use this tool?
features.p2pDesc: Files are sent directly between your devices without passing through a central server.
features.noCloudDesc: Your files are never stored on a server, ensuring your privacy and security.
features.secureDesc: End-to-end encryption means your files are for your eyes only.
features.unlimitedDesc: Send files of any size, as many times as you want. No limits.
